alert.note: Alert for Osceola (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 04 at 2:51AM CST until January 04 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Light snow and drifting snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph. * WHERE...In Iowa, Osceola County. In Minnesota, Jackson County. * WHEN...Until 6 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could reduce visibility and drifting snow may impact previously cleared roads. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
